name: Suit of Hearts
description:
In each level you will be given a grid of hearts, of different colors. Your task is to arrange the hearts in the same order as shown in the task panel. If you successfully arrange the hearts before timer runs out, you will be rewarded with a point. After each win, game timer is reduced by 10 seconds until some minimum value. Try to score as many points as possible. Good Luck!

While in-game,

press 'M' key to return to main menu, and
press 'L' key to return to level selection menu.
